name: Zombie Attack (Brarlow0305RBLXYT)
description:
Instructions:

Use A and D or left arrow and right arrow to move. Use spacebar to shoot. Use R to reload when needed.

Goal:

Don't let the zombies get to you, so shoot them. You earn points when you kill a zombie. But a problem is that you run out of ammo, but you can easily reload.

Thanks for playing and I hope you enjoy!

Note: I made this on scratch so yea.
